articles.title: N.S. reports province's youngest COVID-19 related death, 25 new cases Thursday - CTV News Atlantic
articles.description: Nova Scotia is reporting the province's youngest COVID-19 related death, involving a man in his 30s, along with 25 new cases on Thursday, as the active number of cases in the province drops to 273.
articles.content:
